title: It's a 50/50 Thing
description: Starting over again in a new town is hard enough, but with her Dad gone, her Mum on the verge of a breakdown & a kid sister to look after, Kally's life is suddenly full of secrets. When the gorgeous Jem skates into Kally's life, things finally seem to be going right. But as they grow closer, Kally realises she's not the only one with secrets.
author: Chris Higgins
